name: Arcadenoid
description:
Wheter you are looking to just relax for a few minutes or attempting to win this game, look no further: Arcadenoid is the game for you!

Control the block in the bottom side of the screen and try to predict the path of the ball!

Why download Arcadenoid?

- 3 difficulty levels: you can choose to relax or try extreme challenges;
-Online leaderboard;
- Relaxing graphic;
- Wide variety of powerups;
- Reaching the last level is truly difficult, especially on the highest difficulty;
- Dinamic levels: take advantage of the blocks movement to get the best bounces but hurry up! Every level tends to slowly lower making the game harder and harder!
- It keeps track of your best scores: challenge yourself and your friends!
- Awesome soundtrack!
